reviewText: We found Fireman Sam on Netflix and shortly after, they pulled the Mountain Rescue video.  I ordered it from the UK and my son loves it.  It is region 2, so make sure your player can play that before ordering. (normally a PC dvd player can).

Region 2 dvd!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Will not play in US!! I also just noticed that I supposedly bought a "new" dvd, but there's scratches on it...so I guess I bought a USED that plays only in Region 2 areas! Not good! Please add a description also!
